oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.personalization
Class PersonalizableObject

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.personalization.PersonalizableObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PersonalizableCategory, PersonalizableSuggestGroup
public class PersonalizableObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A Base class that contins much of the implementation of an object personalized by the current user. This object acts as a mutable javabean and will be shown to the UI in a List and wraps the real object in question, for example a category or a suggest group.

Since:
11.1.1.7.4
See Also:

Constructor Detail

PersonalizableObject

protected PersonalizableObject(java.io.Serializable obj,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String displayName,
                               boolean active,
                               boolean selected,
                               boolean userModifiedPreviously,
                               int initialIndex)
Create the Personalizable Object.

Parameters:
obj - the underlying object, possibly a SearchCategory or a Suggest Group or perhaps even null if this is a placeholder for inactive objects.
name - code name that identifies obj. Must be unique.
displayName - name shown to users.
active - is this object active, that is will it be shown to the user in the personalize UI? Inactive objects exist to take space in lists so that ordering is preserved when stored to MDS.
selected - is the object selected via user interaction with a checkbox in the UI.
userModifiedPreviously - has this object ever been modified by the user, that is flipped from selected true to false or vice versa via the search UI. Ordering is not important here.
initialIndex - The initial index of this item in a list, helpful to determine if a change in order has occured.

Create the Personalizable Object - copy constructor.

Parameters:
old - old object.
initialIndex - The initial index of this item in a list, helpful to determine if a change in order has occured.
Method Detail

fromSuggestGroups

public static java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> fromSuggestGroups(java.util.List<SearchSuggestGroup> groups)
A factory method to turn a List of SearchSuggestGroups into a List of PersonalizableObjects. Each SearchSuggestGroup will become the personalizedObject of the final list, and the name and displayName will be used in the PersonalizedObject.

Parameters:
groups - List of SearchSuggestGroups.
Returns:
a parity List of PersonalizableObjects.

saveToMDS

protected static void saveToMDS(java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> pos,
                                java.lang.String moName)
Save the List of personalizableObjects to MDS under moName for the current user. If no base MDS document exists it will be created.

Parameters:
pos - lis of PersonalizableObjects.
moName - name to stre under.

getPersonalizedObjects

protected static java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> getPersonalizedObjects(java.lang.String moName)
A factory method to load the list of personalized objects from MDS. Each object loaded will have a name and selected flag only, it is up to the caller to add other attributes using higher level constructs that the PO represents such as the personalizedObject.

Parameters:
moName - name that stores the MDS objects.
Returns:
A non-null List, this list may contain:
  1. no objects if no personalizations have been saved,
  2. a list of PersonalizableObjects (not subclasses) in user order with active flags set.

deleteMetadata

protected static void deleteMetadata(java.lang.String moName)
Delete the MDS Metadata for the current user for the moName. The base document will be left unchanged.

Parameters:
moName - name that stores the MDS objects.

getMergedList

protected static java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> getMergedList(java.lang.String moName,
                                                                    java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> currentObjects)
Load and return a merged list of objects based on the entries obtained at moName (if any), then overlayed with the currentObjects. Order of the returned list is kept as close as possible to that of the loaded MDS list. If there is no MDS list, the returned list will be of the same size and order as currentObjects.

Parameters:
moName - name that stores the MDS objects.
currentObjects - Real Objects to merge in.
Returns:
merged list.

fromXML

protected static java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> fromXML(org.w3c.dom.Element root)
Turn xml DOM Document into a List of Personalizable Objects. The XML document is assumed to be a simple list under the root.

Parameters:
root - DOM root Element.
Returns:
A List, possibly empty but never null of entried loaded from root.

hasChanges

protected static boolean hasChanges(java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> pos)
Does the list have any changes in it, either positional or a change of selection. This is used to determine whether the list should be saved.

Parameters:
pos - List to check.
Returns:
true if any changes, false otherwise.

Is the Object active, that is is it relevant for the current user or just a placeholder in the containing List?

toString in class java.lang.Object

deleteAllMetadata

public static void deleteAllMetadata()
Factory method to delete all MDS metadata for the current user. Both Category and Suggest Group metadata will be removed. The base MDS documents will not be changed.

isUserModifiedPreviously

public boolean isUserModifiedPreviously()
Has this personalization been previously changed by the user (in another session)?

Returns:
true if previously modified, false otherwise.

resetInitiallySelected

protected void resetInitiallySelected()
Reset the initially selected flag to be in sync with selected.
